definition: favor from an emperor or high official
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist

sentences.english: You I shape with stranger, meet also owes a game.
sentences.chinese: 你我形同陌路，相遇也是恩澤一場。

sentences.english: You and I strangers meet is a grace.
sentences.chinese: 你我形同陌路，相遇也是恩澤一場。

sentences.english: But tailor's bird then the bounty of admire great universe.
sentences.chinese: 而裁縫鳥則是仰大自然的恩澤。

sentences.english: I accept your Enze, he is very excited.
sentences.chinese: 我接受您的恩澤，心中非常激動。

sentences.english: He lived in the smiles of fortune and basked in the favor of the great .
sentences.chinese: 他生活在幸運的微笑之中，承受着偉人的恩澤。

sentences.english: This Sun doesn't want a crown or robe from God's grace.
sentences.chinese: 這太陽並不想從主的恩澤中獲取王冠或法袍。

sentences.english: It is love that proves to be the ultimate healing grace.
sentences.chinese: 只有愛才是具有最終治救力量的恩澤。

sentences.english: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
sentences.chinese: 你能在他們的面目上認識恩澤的光華。

sentences.english: The more you understand grace, the more you're going to be amazed by it.
sentences.chinese: 你對恩澤理解的越深，你會被它的魅力深深觸動。

sentences.english: I see a light, little grace, little faith unfurl.
sentences.chinese: 我看見一絲光亮，些許恩澤，稍微綻放的信念。

definition: Rongchang suburban county in Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
deep roots and vigorous foliage (idiom)/(fig.) well established and growing strongly
unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
